```{python}
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
```

```{python}
topic_sentiment = merged.groupby("lda_topic")["sentiment"].mean()
```


```{python}
topic_sentiment.plot(kind="bar", figsize=(8,5))
plt.title("Average Sentiment by Topic")
```
